GP10bhp_10u:7727: BhP_10.90.005/1 nirviśad-bhṛṅga-vihagair nāditāyāṃ samantataḥ BhP_10.90.005/3 reme ṣoḍaśa-sāhasra- patnīnāṃ eka-vallabhaḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7735: BhP_10.90.009/1 sicyamāno 'cyutas tābhir hasantībhiḥ sma recakaiḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7736: BhP_10.90.009/3 pratiṣiñcan vicikrīḍe yakṣībhir yakṣa-rāḍ iva
GP10bhp_10u:7746: BhP_10.90.012/3 krīḍālaṅkāra-vāsāṃsi kṛṣṇo 'dāt tasya ca striyaḥ

GP10bhp_10u:7749: BhP_10.90.014/1 ūcur mukundaika-dhiyo gira unmatta-vaj jaḍam
GP10bhp_10u:7750: BhP_10.90.014/3 cintayantyo 'ravindākṣaṃ tāni me gadataḥ śṛṇu
GP10bhp_10u:7751: BhP_10.90.015/0 mahiṣya ūcuḥ BhP_10.90.015/1 kurari vilapasi tvaṃ vīta-nidrā na śeṣe BhP_10.90.015/2 svapiti jagati rātryām īśvaro gupta-bodhaḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7752: BhP_10.90.015/3 vayam iva sakhi kaccid gāḍha-nirviddha-cetā
GP10bhp_10u:7755: BhP_10.90.016/2 tvaṃ roravīṣi karuṇaṃ bata cakravāki BhP_10.90.016/3 dāsyaṃ gata vayam
GP10bhp_10u:7756: BhP_10.90.016/4 kiṃ vā srajaṃ spṛhayase kavareṇa voḍhum
GP10bhp_10u:7757: BhP_10.90.017/1 bho bhoḥ sadā niṣṭanase udanvann alabdha-nidro
GP10bhp_10u:7759: BhP_10.90.017/3 kim vā mukundāpahṛtātma-lāñchanaḥ prāptāṃ daśāṃ tvaṃ ca gato duratyayām
GP10bhp_10u:7760: BhP_10.90.018/1 tvaṃ yakṣmaṇā balavatāsi gṛhīta indo BhP_10.90.018/2 kṣīṇas tamo na nija-dīdhitibhiḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7761: BhP_10.90.018/3 kaccin mukunda-gaditāni yathā vayaṃ tvaṃ
GP10bhp_10u:7762: BhP_10.90.018/4 vismṛtya bhoḥ sthagita-gīr upalakṣyase naḥ BhP_10.90.019/1 kiṃ nv ācaritam asmābhir malayānila te 'priyam
GP10bhp_10u:7764: BhP_10.90.020/1 megha śrīmaṃs tvam asi dayito yādavendrasya nūnaṃ
GP10bhp_10u:7765: BhP_10.90.020/2 śrīvatsāṅkaṃ vayam iva bhavān dhyāyati prema-baddhaḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7767: BhP_10.90.020/4 smṛtvā smṛtvā visṛjasi muhur duḥkha-das tat-prasaṅgaḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7769: BhP_10.90.021/3 karavāṇi kim adya te priyaṃ vada me valgita-kaṇṭha kokila
GP10bhp_10u:7770: BhP_10.90.022/1 na calasi na vadasy udāra-buddhe kṣiti-dhara cintayase mahāntam artham
GP10bhp_10u:7771: BhP_10.90.022/3 api bata vasudeva-nandanāṅghriṃ vayam iva kāmayase stanair vidhartum BhP_10.90.023/1 śuṣyad-dhradāḥ karaśitā bata sindhu-patnyaḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7775: BhP_10.90.024/1 haṃsa svāgatam āsyatāṃ piba payo brūhy aṅga śaureḥ kathāṃ
GP10bhp_10u:7776: BhP_10.90.024/2 dūtaṃ tvāṃ nu vidāma kaccid ajitaḥ svasty āsta uktaṃ purā
GP10bhp_10u:7777: BhP_10.90.024/3 kiṃ vā naś cala-sauhṛdaḥ smarati taṃ kasmād bhajāmo vayaṃ BhP_10.90.024/4 kṣaudrālāpaya kāma-daṃ śriyam ṛte saivaika-niṣṭhā striyām
GP10bhp_10u:7780: BhP_10.90.025/3 kriyamāṇena mādhavyo lebhire paramāṃ gatim BhP_10.90.026/1 śruta-mātro 'pi yaḥ strīṇāṃ prasahyākarṣate manaḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7781: BhP_10.90.026/3 uru-gāyoru-gīto vā paśyantīnāṃ ca kiṃ punaḥ BhP_10.90.027/1 yāḥ samparyacaran premṇā pāda-saṃvāhanādibhiḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7782: BhP_10.90.027/3 jagad-guruṃ bhartṛ-buddhyā tāsāṃ kim varṇyate tapaḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7783: BhP_10.90.028/1 evaṃ vedoditaṃ dharmam anutiṣṭhan satāṃ gatiḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7784: BhP_10.90.028/3 gṛhaṃ dharmārtha-kāmānāṃ muhuś cādarśayat padam
GP10bhp_10u:7785: BhP_10.90.029/1 āsthitasya paraṃ dharmaṃ kṛṣṇasya gṛha-medhinām
GP10bhp_10u:7786: BhP_10.90.029/3 āsan ṣoḍaśa-sāhasraṃ mahiṣyaś ca śatādhikam
GP10bhp_10u:7787: BhP_10.90.030/1 tāsāṃ strī-ratna-bhūtānām aṣṭau yāḥ prāg udāhṛtāḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7789: BhP_10.90.031/1 ekaikasyāṃ daśa daśa kṛṣṇo 'jījanad ātmajān
GP10bhp_10u:7790: BhP_10.90.031/3 yāvatya ātmano bhāryā amogha-gatir īśvaraḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7792: BhP_10.90.032/3 āsann udāra-yaśasas teṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu
GP10bhp_10u:7793: BhP_10.90.033/1 pradyumnaś cāniruddhaś ca dīptimān bhānur eva ca
GP10bhp_10u:7794: BhP_10.90.033/3 sāmbo madhur bṛhadbhānuś citrabhānur vṛko 'ruṇaḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7795: BhP_10.90.034/1 puṣkaro vedabāhuś ca śrutadevaḥ sunandanaḥ BhP_10.90.034/3 citrabāhur virūpaś ca kavir nyagrodha eva ca
GP10bhp_10u:7796: BhP_10.90.035/1 eteṣām api rājendra tanu-jānāṃ madhu-dviṣaḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7797: BhP_10.90.035/3 pradyumna āsīt prathamaḥ pitṛ-vad rukmiṇī-sutaḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7798: BhP_10.90.036/1 sa rukmiṇo duhitaram upayeme mahā-rathaḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7800: BhP_10.90.037/1 sa cāpi rukmiṇaḥ pautrīṃ dauhitro jagṛhe tataḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7801: BhP_10.90.037/3 vajras tasyābhavad yas tu mauṣalād avaśeṣitaḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7802: BhP_10.90.038/1 pratibāhur abhūt tasmāt subāhus tasya cātmajaḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7803: BhP_10.90.038/3 subāhoḥ śāntaseno 'bhūc chatasenas tu tat-sutaḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7804: BhP_10.90.039/1 na hy etasmin kule jātā adhanā abahu-prajāḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7805: BhP_10.90.039/3 alpāyuṣo 'lpa-vīryāś ca abrahmaṇyāś ca jajñire
GP10bhp_10u:7807: BhP_10.90.040/3 saṅkhyā na śakyate kartum api varṣāyutair nṛpa
GP10bhp_10u:7808: BhP_10.90.041/1 tisraḥ koṭyaḥ sahasrāṇām aṣṭāśīti-śatāni ca
GP10bhp_10u:7809: BhP_10.90.041/3 āsan yadu-kulācāryāḥ kumārāṇām iti śrutam

GP10bhp_10u:7812: BhP_10.90.043/3 te cotpannā manuṣyeṣu prajā dṛptā babādhire
GP10bhp_10u:7813: BhP_10.90.044/1 tan-nigrahāya hariṇā proktā devā yadoḥ kule BhP_10.90.044/3 avatīrṇāḥ kula-śataṃ teṣām ekādhikaṃ nṛpa
GP10bhp_10u:7814: BhP_10.90.045/1 teṣāṃ pramāṇaṃ bhagavān prabhutvenābhavad dhariḥ BhP_10.90.045/3 ye cānuvartinas tasya vavṛdhuḥ sarva-yādavāḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7816: BhP_10.90.046/3 na viduḥ santam ātmānaṃ vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa-cetasaḥ
GP10bhp_10u:7817: BhP_10.90.047/1 tīrthaṃ cakre nṛponaṃ yad ajani yaduṣu svaḥ-sarit
GP10bhp_10u:7819: BhP_10.90.047/2 vidviṭ-snigdhāḥ svarūpaṃ yayur ajita-para śrīr yad-arthe
GP10bhp_10u:7821: BhP_10.90.047/3 yan-nāmāmaṅgala-ghnaṃ śrutam atha gaditaṃ yat-kṛto

GP10bhp_10u:7835: BhP_10.90.050/4 grāmād vanaṃ kṣiti-bhujo 'pi yayur yad-arthāḥ
